name: Ludo 3D: Aeroplane Chess
description:
This is a real 3D Chinese Ludo (Aeroplane Chess).

Unlike the other Ludo games in AppStore, this game provides you totally different experience.

Features:
- 2D/3D mode. Play in 2D or 3D mode whatever you like
- Real Dice. Yes, it is a REAL dice
- Flexible AI Level. There are 3 levels of computer player.
- Highly flexible. You can adjust the game rule yourself
- Dark mode. It is very interesting, you should never play it before.
- Many different themes.

Wiki: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aeroplane_Chess
